text: Hi Marcelo. No worries about being late, I'm super swamped in work right now anyway. Your day to day sounds very busy. I've been thinking developing my portfolio when I finally graduate so I have a few questions. Knowing what you know now how would you go about teaching yourself to animate from scratch? I feel like I have basic knowledge of storyboarding and drawing I've just never made anything fully animated and was thinking about making something short to have a go at it.
